name: AEAssessmentApplication
desc: A representation of an app that users can access during an assessment.

items.name: init(bundleIdentifier: String, teamIdentifier: String?)
items.desc: Creates a representation of an app using its bundle and team identifiers.

items.name: init(bundleIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a representation of an app using its bundle identifier.

items.name: var bundleIdentifier: String
items.desc: The bundle identifier of the app.

items.name: var teamIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The team identifier of the app.

items.name: var requiresSignatureValidation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the session requires the app to have a valid code signature to run.
